content.heading: <ruby> Tag
paragraphs: The <ruby> tag specifies a ruby annotation.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used for pronunciation or meaning, common in Japanese.
Contains <rt> and optional <rp> for non-supporting browsers.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 5, Edge 5.5, Firefox 38, Safari 5, Opera 15.
